choices: Ethnography is a type of research aimed at exploring how communication works.
Ethnography can be used in business to investigate customer attitudes.
Designing new products can help business to understand ethnographic research.
It is better for cooks to use cups to measure out things like sugar and flour.
How ethnography research works in business is illustrated by the use of a kitchen equipment.
